definition: large in amount or extent or degree, receptacle that holds odds and ends (as sewing materials), put (things or places) in order
details:
adjective
- large in amount or extent or degree
= synonyms: goodly
- marked by order and cleanliness in appearance or habits
= example: marked by order and cleanliness in appearance or habits
- (of hair) neat and tidy
= synonyms: kempt
noun
- receptacle that holds odds and ends (as sewing materials)
verb
- put (things or places) in order
= synonyms: neaten, clean up, straighten out, tidy up, straighten, square away
